TopicTitle: HOTAS Axes no longer map in 1.0

Articles.Content: Using CH products HOTAS setup, all joystick and throttle axes no longer maps correctly. Further I have deleted my settings file but every time it recreates and I try to set up my stick and rudder, all my devices (joystick, throttle, rudder pedals) get detected as the same name. Buttons work fine but the axes are totally hosed. Worked fine in 0.9 and in all other games.
